nodes.text: Fabritech was a large corporation with a wide variety of military and commercial products.

Though Fabritech was a leader in starship sensor technology, and their components were found in starships dating back to the Galactic Republic, it was the leadership of staunch New Order supporter Kvarn Mandel which won Fabritech a subcontract for TIE Series components from Sienar Fleet Systems and caused the company to bloom during the Galactic Civil War.

Fabritech was based on the planet Fabrin, and the Mandel family was heavily involved in company business. Despite the company's Imperial ties, Fabritech products were found in many Rebel ships, and Kvarn Mandel's youngest daughter Samire Mandel may have actually joined the Rebellion.
Fabritech products had a reputation for durability and longevity, and their components were also used in the leading starfighters of the New Republic and the Galactic Federation of Free Alliances.
